name: Golbertz Party Sing-A-Long
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Made for Ludum Dare 33

You're invited to the the Annual Bobble-Head party and are at the beck and call of the guests. Choose your Angelic side to please the guests. 

Use the mouse to click through till you get to the guests requests. Then your Angelic and Devilish sides will appear and you have to try and click the Angel to proceed. It's randomized so be careful when you click or you won't know what's going to happen. There are quite a few different outcomes depending on whether you click the Angel or Devil. 

Wanted to keep the responses ambiguous so the player can fill in the gaps.

Very short game but hopefully it means people can get the full experience. 

Controls:

Z/LEFT KEY  - select left Angel/Devil

X/RIGHT KEY - select right  Angel/Devil

Or you can just use the MOUSE
